author: Josh Rick
text:
I have been an active buyer & seller on Grailed for years, probably since early 2015. For a time it was my favorite place to shop, having over 100+ transactions and an almost perfect feedback rating (5 stars). My IP address was then banned out of nowhere for "posting of inauthentic items" even though I had sold another of these items before with positive feedback from the buyers. I EVEN HAD THE RECEIPT IN HAND but grailed has not responded to my emails or appeals in over a month and has yet to give me any info. I am disappointed to say the least as I know how great of a website it can be because I haven't had problems before this but now I see that their customer service is almost non existent and seem to not care about their active users.
Edit: account email is joshrickk @ gmail. com
title: Where is the customer service ????

author: christopher gutierrez
text: Grailed is such a good platform to sell on but they are too strict about some things. Unknowingly i sold an inauthentic item, and the buyer opened a case on it and i immediately accepted the return. I have made over 70 transactions and have a 4.5 star review on my account. We do not sell inauthentic items but one slipped through the cracks, and as im sure everybody has made mistakes before in the past unintentionally. not to mention this situation has only happened 1 time, and they are going by the buyers words. What if in a different situation the buyer is just trying to scam? I emailed grailed numerous times and explained to them the whole situation and its been over 48 hours without any response. If its not for this issue grailed would be a 5 star app. They should definitely give second or even third chances, especially to sellers with good feedback on numerous transactions.
title: Grailed is such a good platform to sell…
